channel.title: Giant Bomb's "The Hotspot" (Archive)
channel.description: Giant Bomb's revival of the Gamespot "Hotspot" podcast, courtesy of the Internet Archive.
channel.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
channel.itunes:summary: Giant Bomb's revival of the Gamespot "Hotspot" podcast, courtesy of the Internet Archive.
channel.generator: BlackDeath3's custom Giant Bomb RSS feed generator

item.title: Episode 360
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Something old, something new, something something The HotSpot! Join as we talk about playing old video games.
item.itunes:subtitle: Something old, something new, something something The HotSpot! Join as we talk about playing old video games.
item.itunes:summary: Something old, something new, something something The HotSpot! Join as we talk about playing old video games.

item.title: Episode 361
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: With the launch of new consoles upon us we take a look back at the good, the bad, and the bizarre decisions.
item.itunes:subtitle: With the launch of new consoles upon us we take a look back at the good, the bad, and the bizarre decisions.
item.itunes:summary: With the launch of new consoles upon us we take a look back at the good, the bad, and the bizarre decisions.

item.title: Episode 362
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Video game reviews have been changing for a long time, and luckily we've got some of the folks that have been there changing them!
item.itunes:subtitle: Video game reviews have been changing for a long time, and luckily we've got some of the folks that have been there changing them!
item.itunes:summary: Video game reviews have been changing for a long time, and luckily we've got some of the folks that have been there changing them!

item.title: Episode 363
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We're back to discuss why you should or maybe shouldn't put so much stock in those reviews we all argued about.
item.itunes:subtitle: We're back to discuss why you should or maybe shouldn't put so much stock in those reviews we all argued about.
item.itunes:summary: We're back to discuss why you should or maybe shouldn't put so much stock in those reviews we all argued about.

item.title: Episode 364
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We're back to take a look at some of the hairy discoveries folks have hiding in their electronics junk drawer.
item.itunes:subtitle: We're back to take a look at some of the hairy discoveries folks have hiding in their electronics junk drawer.
item.itunes:summary: We're back to take a look at some of the hairy discoveries folks have hiding in their electronics junk drawer.

item.title: Episode 365
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Happy Anniversary Sega! Let's talk a bit about our experiences with your past and what might be ahead.
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Anniversary Sega! Let's talk a bit about our experiences with your past and what might be ahead.
item.itunes:summary: Happy Anniversary Sega! Let's talk a bit about our experiences with your past and what might be ahead.

item.title: Episode 366
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: It's grab bag Friday, as we talk through everything from the gargantuan size of the PS5 to our disc-less console future and long lost Minecraft worlds!
item.itunes:subtitle: It's grab bag Friday, as we talk through everything from the gargantuan size of the PS5 to our disc-less console future and long lost Minecraft worlds!
item.itunes:summary: It's grab bag Friday, as we talk through everything from the gargantuan size of the PS5 to our disc-less console future and long lost Minecraft worlds!

item.title: Episode 367
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Let's take some time and talk about EA, but before that let's talk miscellaneous tech!
item.itunes:subtitle: Let's take some time and talk about EA, but before that let's talk miscellaneous tech!
item.itunes:summary: Let's take some time and talk about EA, but before that let's talk miscellaneous tech!

item.title: Episode 368
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: It's the end of the week and it's time to blow this week out of our collective PCs.
item.itunes:subtitle: It's the end of the week and it's time to blow this week out of our collective PCs.
item.itunes:summary: It's the end of the week and it's time to blow this week out of our collective PCs.

item.title: Episode 369
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: We're back with some Free Talking Friday with a range of topics including headwear, modern Ubisoft games, and the best video game movies.
item.itunes:subtitle: We're back with some Free Talking Friday with a range of topics including headwear, modern Ubisoft games, and the best video game movies.
item.itunes:summary: We're back with some Free Talking Friday with a range of topics including headwear, modern Ubisoft games, and the best video game movies.

item.title: Episode 370
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Hostmaster Rich Gallup returns to The HotSpot to talk about how life has changed over the last 15 years when it comes to making podcasts about video games.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hostmaster Rich Gallup returns to The HotSpot to talk about how life has changed over the last 15 years when it comes to making podcasts about video games.
item.itunes:summary: Hostmaster Rich Gallup returns to The HotSpot to talk about how life has changed over the last 15 years when it comes to making podcasts about video games.

item.title: Episode 371
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: This week, the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X launches are on trial!
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X launches are on trial!
item.itunes:summary: This week, the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X launches are on trial!

item.title: Episode 372
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Got any big video game purchases you regret? No? How about posters? Statues? Ok, how about old drinks that look like they are poison?
item.itunes:subtitle: Got any big video game purchases you regret? No? How about posters? Statues? Ok, how about old drinks that look like they are poison?

item.title: Episode 373
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: The power is back on and we're all here to talk about internet security, job security, and securing our upcoming programming schedules!
item.itunes:subtitle: The power is back on and we're all here to talk about internet security, job security, and securing our upcoming programming schedules!
item.itunes:summary: The power is back on and we're all here to talk about internet security, job security, and securing our upcoming programming schedules!

item.description: We've got a range of topics including Epic vs Apple, Microsoft vs Sony, and thermal paste versus graphite pads!

item.itunes:summary: We've got a range of topics including Epic vs Apple, Microsoft vs Sony, and thermal paste versus graphite pads!

item.title: Episode 375
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Those hard drives! We're shucking and driving as we head into the weekend as we talk about the fun and dangers of home repair, temptations to buy expensive flight sim gear, and solder?

item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb

item.itunes:summary: What begins as a fun way to reminisce about old cartoon intro songs quickly escalates into a full on audio arms race of nostalgia!

item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: This week we break down the state of the video game news as of September 2020 before diving into some affable British TV and radio.

item.itunes:summary: This week we break down the state of the video game news as of September 2020 before diving into some affable British TV and radio.

item.title: Episode 386
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: As the PS5 swings into its launch window we're here to tell you more about the UI, Miles Morales, and how things are shaping up leading up to the full console release.
item.itunes:subtitle: As the PS5 swings into its launch window we're here to tell you more about the UI, Miles Morales, and how things are shaping up leading up to the full console release.

item.description: We're joined by engineer Will Carle to learn all his dark secrets before he departs for new adventures.
item.itunes:subtitle: We're joined by engineer Will Carle to learn all his dark secrets before he departs for new adventures.
item.itunes:summary: We're joined by engineer Will Carle to learn all his dark secrets before he departs for new adventures.

item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Awards season is almost upon us, and that can mean only one thing: time to start making lists.

item.itunes:summary: Awards season is almost upon us, and that can mean only one thing: time to start making lists.

item.title: Episode 389
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Was Sega's 32x one of the biggest events in gaming? How would VR rank for you? What about Fortnite? Join us for our brief tour through some industry milestones.
item.itunes:subtitle: Was Sega's 32x one of the biggest events in gaming? How would VR rank for you? What about Fortnite? Join us for our brief tour through some industry milestones.

item.description: We're talking about diners, drive-ins, and Mass Effect? Is Mass Effect coming back... we'll see.

item.itunes:summary: We're talking about diners, drive-ins, and Mass Effect? Is Mass Effect coming back... we'll see.

item.title: Episode 391
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: You thought we were done talking about Cyberpunk? No? Well, you were right. We talk about what, if any, the events around its release could mean going forward.

item.description: We're back and talking about packing up old studios and navigating that corporate lifestyle.

item.description: We start with talk about Sony's Japan Studio and wind up talking about the entire collapse of the video game industry! All in one show!
